string.name: don_t_have_an_account_sign_up_now
string.u: Don\'t have an account? Sign up now

resources.string: Enter Your registered mobile number and email below:

A1. We deliver for our customers from anywhere our customers would like. We take your order by internet and place it with the restaurant. We dispatch a meal courier to pick up the food, pack it in an insulated carrier and deliver it directly to you. Usually, your meal courier will be waiting at the restaurant when the food comes out of the kitchen. We are not affiliated with some of the restaurants and in no way are we claiming to be in business with some of the businesses listed, unless otherwise stated. We also offer grocery delivery services for those who are interested.
Q2. How can I place my order?
A2. You can place your order online at www.foodrunner.com or with our free android app
Q3. Do you have a delivery fee?

A3. Yes, our delivery fee varies depending on the restaurant. and locations Most restaurants have a Rs.50 delivery fee and if the fee differs, the price will be shown when you hover your mouse over the name of the restaurant.
Q4. Are the prices different than at the restaurant?
A4. We do have a service fees of 10% for our non-partnered restaurants service fee vary depending of the location.
Q5. What can be the estimated cost of your restaurant app development service?
A5. Every project has its own requirements and we take a unique and fresh approach for the same. Depending on the scope, features and type of project, the cost of the application varies.
Q6. What payment methods you offer in your ordering system software?

A6. There are a plethora of payment options available for the easy checkout of your customers. COD (Cash on Delivery), CC (Credit Card), DC (Debit Card) and third party on request. The other payment methods can also be added as per region and client request.
Can\'t find any restaurant with that name…
